Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Nabii Nuuc: yi Rabbow diggah usun (boola le mara kinnuk) yamri cineeniih, le maaluu kee le xalay finqak sa tu kah osse wayta abbottii kee gaddaloola katyen iyye
Kaadu usun kaxxa uma maláh malsen
Kaadu sinni yallitteh qibaadá macabina sittak iyyen, kaadu Waddiiy, Suwaaqaay, Yaqhusuvy, Yaquuqh kee Nasri deqsitta numtinwellitteh qibaadá macabina sittak iyyen
Kaadu nummah maggo mara finqiseenihik ta daalimiinih finqak sah tu mossin iyye Nabii Nuuc isi Rabbik
Usun aben dambitteh sabbatah leet yunxuqsumeeniih, girá culsumen, tokkel usun Yallak kalah cateynit magennon
Kaadu Nabii Nuuc: yi Rabbow baaxô bagul koroosite marak inkittuy mutuccu iyya macabin iyye
Diggah atu ken cabtek ku naqoosa makkoyse loonuuh, maxalan umeynay kaxxa koroosannu le akke waytek
Nabii Nuuc: yi Rabbow yoo kee yi xaleynaay, yi buxá moominiinih anuk cule maraa kee, lab moominiin kee say moominiinih inkih dambi cabaay, daalimiinih baatik sa tu mossin iyye
